text: Hilton Crawford (February 2, 1945 – July 5, 2014) was an American football defensive back. He played for the Buffalo Bills in 1969. He died on July 5, 2014, in Buffalo, New York at age 69. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American football defensive backs Category:Grambling State Tigers football players Category:Buffalo Bills players
title: Hilton Crawford
